abstract: Ariel Schulman and Henry Joost talk about their techniques in directing the third installment of the ghosts-on-video franchise.
snippet: Ariel Schulman and Henry Joost talk about their techniques in directing the third installment of the ghosts-on-video franchise.
lead_paragraph: Spoiler Alert: In "Paranormal Activity 3," cameras are set up inside a house, doors mysteriously slam shut, bed sheets mysteriously move and things mysteriously go bump in the night.
